name: Fazoli's
0:
”Alexa, open Fazoli's.”
”What's on the menu?”
”What's in my cart?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fazoli's
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Order food for pickup from your local Fazoli's Italian restaurant. Hear the menu, get product info and pricing, build your shopping cart, check out and eat! Fazoli's is the first of many restaurant brands to be powered Orderscape. 

To get started:

1. We strongly recommend that you set your current address for Echo devices using the Fazzoli's skill in your Alexa app (or visit http://alexa.amazon.com). This will help the skill find a nearby Fazoli's restaurant more quickly and easily. Go to Settings > Devices to select a device you want to set a location for. Go to General > Device Location to edit and set your location. Repeat for other devices you intend to order with from Fazoli's.

2. In your Alexa app, enable the Fazoli's skill. It should ask you to grant permission to share your Device Address with the skill. Please ensure the Device Address option is enabled and click the Save Permissions button.

3. Link the Fazoli's skill to your Orderscape account by signing in if you've already created an Orderscape account prior, or click Create Account button to sign up, then link your account. It's quick and easy. You must also supply a valid credit card during signup to check out and make future purchases from within the skill. You only need to sign up once. 

NOTE: This skill is not linked to the fazolis.com website at this time. If you already have a Fazoli's account there, please do not use that to login to Orderscape.com. Instead, please create a new account with Orderscape and log in with that email and password. 

For a complete guide on how to use this skill, please visit https://orderscape.com/help.

To view the Fazoli's online menu, please visit https://my.orderscape.com/brands/fazolis/menus.

We hope to enjoy the skill, and we welcome your feedback! 

Powered by Orderscape™.
